scripts.publish: targetDirName="new-$(date '+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S')" && cp -r dist ~/lucaheider/stage/${targetDirName} && echo "...published files of ./dist to: ${targetDirName}" && open . ~/lucaheider/stage/
scripts.postpublish: git commit -a -m"new published site: ${targetDirName}" && git checkout -b backup_${targetDirName} && git commit -a -m"branch for backup: ${targetDirName}" && git checkout master && git status
